page.title: 12The Weekend
page.content:
It's great at the{weekend}because I don't have to go to school! We get up late, but not as late as Mum and Dad so I get a chance to play on our {computer}.
Most Saturdays we play in the garden on our{bikes}or on the{climbing {frame}. Sometimes we put our{tent}up to play in. Some Saturdays we have to go into{Maidenhead}to do the{shopping} - this is really boring but Dad says we have to.
On Sundays we often go out for the day in the car if the weather is fine and have a picnic. We have been to the{seaside,}the{Downs}and to the { {Windsor Safari Park}. The only trouble with Sunday is it's Monday the next day!
